segment_text: THE YEAR WAS 2081, and everybody was finally equal. They weren't only equal before God and the law.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: They were equal every which way. Nobody was smarter than anybody else.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: Nobody was better looking than anybody else. Nobody was stronger or quicker than anybody else.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: All this equality was due to the 211th, 212th, and 213th Amendments to the Constitution, and to the unceasing vigilance of agents of the United States Handicapper General.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: Some things about living still weren't quite right, though. April for instance, still drove people crazy by not being springtime.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: And it was in that clammy month that the H-G men took George and Hazel Bergeron's fourteen-year-old son, Harrison, away.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: It was tragic, all right, but George and Hazel couldn't think about it very hard. Hazel had a perfectly average intelligence, which meant she couldn't think about anything except in short bursts.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: And George, while his intelligence was way above normal, had a little mental handicap radio in his ear. He was required by law to wear it at all times.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: It was tuned to a government transmitter. Every twenty seconds or so, the transmitter would send out some sharp noise to keep people like George from taking unfair advantage of their brains.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: George and Hazel were watching television. There were tears on Hazel's cheeks, but she'd forgotten for the moment what they were about.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: On the television screen were ballerinas.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: A buzzer sounded in George's head. His thoughts fled in panic, like bandits from a burglar alarm.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "That was a real pretty dance, that dance they just did," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Huh" said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "That dance-it was nice," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Yup," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: He tried to think a little about the ballerinas.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: They weren't really very good-no better than anybody else would have been, anyway. They were burdened with sashweights and bags of birdshot, and their faces were masked, so that no one, seeing a free and graceful gesture or a pretty face, would feel like something the cat drug in.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: George was toying with the vague notion that maybe dancers shouldn't be handicapped. But he didn't get very far with it before another noise in his ear radio scattered his thoughts.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: George winced.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: So did two out of the eight ballerinas.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Hazel saw him wince. Having no mental handicap herself, she had to ask George what the latest sound had been.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Sounded like somebody hitting a milk bottle with a ball peen hammer," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I'd think it would be real interesting, hearing all the different sounds," said Hazel a little envious. "All the things they think up."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Um," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Only, if I was Handicapper General, you know what I would do?" said Hazel. Hazel, as a matter of fact, bore a strong resemblance to the Handicapper General, a woman named Diana Moon Glampers.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "If I was Diana Moon Glampers," said Hazel, "I'd have chimes on Sunday-just chimes. Kind of in honor of religion."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I could think, if it was just chimes," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Well-maybe make 'em real loud," said Hazel. "I think I'd make a good Handicapper General."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Good as anybody else," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Who knows better than I do what normal is?" said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Right," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: He began to think glimmeringly about his abnormal son who was now in jail, about Harrison, but a twenty-one-gun salute in his head stopped that.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Boy!" said Hazel, "that was a doozy, wasn't it?"
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: It was such a doozy that George was white and trembling, and tears stood on the rims of his red eyes.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: Two of of the eight ballerinas had collapsed to the studio floor, were holding their temples.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "All of a sudden you look so tired," said Hazel. "Why don't you stretch out on the sofa, so's you can rest your handicap bag on the pillows, honeybunch."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: She was referring to the forty-seven pounds of birdshot in a canvas bag, which was padlocked around George's neck.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Go on and rest the bag for a little while," she said. "I don't care if you're not equal to me for a while."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: George weighed the bag with his hands. "I don't mind it," he said.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I don't notice it any more. It's just a part of me."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "You been so tired lately-kind of wore out," said Hazel. "If there was just some way we could make a little hole in the bottom of the bag, and just take out a few of them lead balls. Just a few."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Two years in prison and two thousand dollars fine for every ball I took out," said George. "I don't call that a bargain."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "If you could just take a few out when you came home from work," said Hazel. "I mean-you don't compete with anybody around here. You just sit around."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "If I tried to get away with it," said George, "then other people'd get away with it-and pretty soon we'd be right back to the dark ages again, with everybody competing against everybody else. You wouldn't like that, would you?"
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I'd hate it," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "There you are," said George. The minute people start cheating on laws, what do you think happens to society?"
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: If Hazel hadn't been able to come up with an answer to this question, George couldn't have supplied one. A siren was going off in his head.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Reckon it'd fall all apart," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "What would?" said George blankly.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Society," said Hazel uncertainly. "Wasn't that what you just said?
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Who knows?" said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: The television program was suddenly interrupted for a news bulletin.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: It wasn't clear at first as to what the bulletin was about, since the announcer, like all announcers, had a serious speech impediment.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: For about half a minute, and in a state of high excitement, the announcer tried to say, "Ladies and Gentlemen." He finally gave up, handed the bulletin to a ballerina to read.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "That's all right-" Hazel said of the announcer, "he tried. That's the big thing. He tried to do the best he could with what God gave him. He should get a nice raise for trying so hard."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Ladies and Gentlemen," said the ballerina, reading the bulletin.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: She must have been extraordinarily beautiful, because the mask she wore was hideous. And it was easy to see that she was the strongest and most graceful of all the dancers, for her handicap bags were as big as those worn by two-hundred pound men.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: And she had to apologize at once for her voice, which was a very unfair voice for a woman to use. Her voice was a warm, luminous, timeless melody.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "Excuse me-" she said, and she began again, making her voice absolutely uncompetitive.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "Harrison Bergeron, age fourteen," she said in a grackle squawk, "has just escaped from jail, where he was held on suspicion of plotting to overthrow the government. He is a genius and an athlete, is under-handicapped, and should be regarded as extremely dangerous."
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: A police photograph of Harrison Bergeron was flashed on the screen-upside down, then sideways, upside down again, then right side up.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The picture showed the full length of Harrison against a background calibrated in feet and inches. He was exactly seven feet tall.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The rest of Harrison's appearance was Halloween and hardware. Nobody had ever born heavier handicaps.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: He had outgrown hindrances faster than the H-G men could think them up. Instead of a little ear radio for a mental handicap, he wore a tremendous pair of earphones, and spectacles with thick wavy lenses.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The spectacles were intended to make him not only half blind, but to give him whanging headaches besides.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Scrap metal was hung all over him. Ordinarily, there was a certain symmetry, a military neatness to the handicaps issued to strong people, but Harrison looked like a walking junkyard.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: In the race of life, Harrison carried three hundred pounds.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: And to offset his good looks, the H-G men required that he wear at all times a red rubber ball for a nose, keep his eyebrows shaved off, and cover his even white teeth with black caps at snaggle-tooth random.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "If you see this boy," said the ballerina, "do not - I repeat, do not - try to reason with him."
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: There was the shriek of a door being torn from its hinges.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Screams and barking cries of consternation came from the television set. The photograph of Harrison Bergeron on the screen jumped again and again, as though dancing to the tune of an earthquake.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: George Bergeron correctly identified the earthquake, and well he might have - for many was the time his own home had danced to the same crashing tune.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "My God-" said George, "that must be Harrison!"
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: The realization was blasted from his mind instantly by the sound of an automobile collision in his head.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: When George could open his eyes again, the photograph of Harrison was gone. A living, breathing Harrison filled the screen.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Clanking, clownish, and huge, Harrison stood - in the center of the studio. The knob of the uprooted studio door was still in his hand.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Ballerinas, technicians, musicians, and announcers cowered on their knees before him, expecting to die.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "I am the Emperor!" cried Harrison. "Do you hear? I am the Emperor! Everybody must do what I say at once!"
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: He stamped his foot and the studio shook.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "Even as I stand here" he bellowed, "crippled, hobbled, sickened - I am a greater ruler than any man who ever lived! Now watch me become what I can become!"
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison tore the straps of his handicap harness like wet tissue paper, tore straps guaranteed to support five thousand pounds.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison's scrap-iron handicaps crashed to the floor.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison thrust his thumbs under the bar of the padlock that secured his head harness. The bar snapped like celery.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison smashed his headphones and spectacles against the wall. He flung away his rubber-ball nose, revealed a man that would have awed Thor, the god of thunder.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "I shall now select my Empress!" he said, looking down on the cowering people. "Let the first woman who dares rise to her feet claim her mate and her throne!"
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: A moment passed, and then a ballerina arose, swaying like a willow.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison plucked the mental handicap from her ear, snapped off her physical handicaps with marvelous delicacy. Last of all he removed her mask.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: She was blindingly beautiful.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: "Now-" said Harrison, taking her hand, "shall we show the people the meaning of the word dance? Music!" he commanded.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The musicians scrambled back into their chairs, and Harrison stripped them of their handicaps, too. "Play your best," he told them, "and I'll make you barons and dukes and earls."
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The music began. It was normal at first-cheap, silly, false.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: But Harrison snatched two musicians from their chairs, waved them like batons as he sang the music as he wanted it played. He slammed them back into their chairs.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The music began again and was much improved.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Harrison and his Empress merely listened to the music for a while-listened gravely, as though synchronizing their heartbeats with it.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: They shifted their weights to their toes. Harrison placed his big hands on the girls tiny waist, letting her sense the weightlessness that would soon be hers.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: And then, in an explosion of joy and grace, into the air they sprang! Not only were the laws of the land abandoned, but the law of gravity and the laws of motion as well.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: They reeled, whirled, swiveled, flounced, capered, gamboled, and spun. They leaped like deer on the moon.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: The studio ceiling was thirty feet high, but each leap brought the dancers nearer to it. It became their obvious intention to kiss the ceiling.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: They kissed it. And then, neutraling gravity with love and pure will, they remained suspended in air inches below the ceiling, and they kissed each other for a long, long time.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: It was then that Diana Moon Glampers, the Handicapper General, came into the studio with a double-barreled ten-gauge shotgun.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: She fired twice, and the Emperor and the Empress were dead before they hit the floor.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: Diana Moon Glampers loaded the gun again. She aimed it at the musicians and told them they had ten seconds to get their handicaps back on.
scene_description: indoors, television studio, bright stage lights, broadcast equipment

segment_text: It was then that the Bergerons' television tube burned out.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: Hazel turned to comment about the blackout to George. But George had gone out into the kitchen for a can of beer.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: George came back in with the beer, paused while a handicap signal shook him up. And then he sat down again.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "You been crying" he said to Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Yup," she said.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "What about?" he said.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I forget," she said. "Something real sad on television."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "What was it?" he said.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "It's all kind of mixed up in my mind," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Forget sad things," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "I always do," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "That's my girl," said George. He winced.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: There was the sound of a rivetting gun in his head.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Gee - I could tell that one was a doozy," said Hazel.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "You can say that again," said George.
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa

segment_text: "Gee-" said Hazel, "I could tell that one was a doozy."
scene_description: indoors, futuristic modest living room, old television set, worn sofa
